ch.unibe.iam.graph
Class UVertexHash

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.graph.Attributes
      ch.unibe.iam.graph.GraphElement
          ch.unibe.iam.graph.Vertex
              ch.unibe.iam.graph.UVertexHash
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attributable, java.io.Serializable
public class UVertexHash
extends Vertex

This class implements an undirected vertex using a HashMap. Notes to the implementation: Multiedges are represented using a list of Edges.

Version:
$Revision: 1.20 $ $Date: 2003/03/19 14:00:37 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger
See Also:

hasEdgeTo

public final boolean hasEdgeTo(Vertex pVertex)
Tests if this vertex has an edge with the specified vertex. The edge has to originate with this vertex (tail vertex) and point to the specified other vertex (head vertex).

Specified by:
hasEdgeTo in class Vertex
Parameters:
pVertex - Head vertex of requested edge.
Returns:
true if an edge as specified exists, else false.
